entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
